title: MINI PLUS
content: MINI PLUS rotary tillers have a robust design that is particularly appropriate for small-scale farming, inter-rowcultivation and green houses. These rotary tillers can be used for dry cultivation but also wet cultivation insmall paddy fields. MINI PLUS for the farmers’ tiniest needs.

title: MINI PLUS TH
content: MINI PLUS TH rotary tillers have a robust design that is particularly appropriate for small-scale farming, inter-row cultivation and green houses. These rotary tillers can be used for dry cultivation but also wet cultivation in small paddy fields. MINI PLUS TH for the farmers’ tiniest needs.

title: REVERSE FORWARD
content: The RF rotary tiller is a compact, two-way operating implement, i.e. the gearbox moves in dual directions reverse and forward. The RF rotary tiller performs deep tillage along with fine pulverization in the first passage, while its J-shaped blades penetrate the ground for deeper tillage.

title: FMA ULTRA LIGHT
content: The FMA rotary tillers are designed for a variety of horticulture, agriculture and commercial applications to till the soil for seedbed and planting preparation. Ultralight FMA rotary tillers are available in different sizes and working widths.

title: UL MANUAL
content: The UL MANUAL rotary tiller is a side-shift tiller. By means of its adjustable rotor shaft, it can be operated in central as well as in offset positions. This makes the tiller particularly suitable for operations in open orchards, where tractor maneuvering might be quite tricky.

title: PROTON
content: PROTON rotary tillers are designed for mini tractors. It is a powerful handy tool for lighter applications where soft tillage is required in inter cultivations.

title: FIGHTER
content: Soil and seedbed preparation are essential steps in modern agriculture. Efficient and careful operations are key to producing high crop yields. Likewise important are reliable implements and farming tools when it comes to breaking and loosening the soil, removing weeds, increasing nutrients, improving soil aeration and drainage. Whether it is for primary or secondary tillage, Shaktiman has the right solution to prepare your soilfor healthy crops.

title: UL
content: UL rotary tillers are particularly suitable for small-scale farming with smaller HP tractors. The UL series has been exclusively designed for European and American markets. UL rotary tillers are perfect for gardening and hobby farming.

title: UM
content: The UM series consists of versatile medium-duty tillers for tractors with 25 to 50 HP. Their low maintenance and dependable design are perfect for demanding soil. UM rotary tillers are also suitable for vineyards and orchards.

title: UH
content: The UH series consists of heavy-duty tillers suitable for 40 to 65 HP tractors. These tillers are intended for very demanding and stony soil. The sturdy design and heavy-duty gearbox are apt for tough usage.

title: REGULAR LIGHT
content: The REGULAR LIGHT rotary tillers have a lean and mean design particularly carved out for puddling operations. These handy implements are great for seedbed preparation on clay soil or delta belts. The REGULAR LIGHT rotary tillers are agile and robust at the same time. Thanks to their light weight and easy handling, they contribute to the tractor’s fuel efficiency. Variable speeds and multiple blade options facilitate secondary tillage operations.

title: REGULAR SMART
content: REGULAR SMART rotary tillers are multi-talents that can be used for both wet and dry tillage operations.REGULAR SMART tillers prepare a fine seedbed on light and medium soils with minimum passages with all weather conditions. The series comes with multiple drives, speeds, and blades to choose from.

title: REGULAR PLUS
content: REGULAR PLUS rotary tillers are suitable for medium and hard soil combining the features of the LIGHT and SMART models of the same product family. REGULAR PLUS rotary tillers are available in multiple drives, speeds, and drives and are perfect for superior seedbed preparation for both dry and wet soil tillage operations.

title: SEMI CHAMPION
content: The SEMI CHAMPION rotary tillers have developed to preserve and enhance soil condition and health. The specifically designed blades and rotor contribute to retaining moisture and increasing porosity. This results in better aeration and ensures the quality of seed germination. The robust and stable construction is available with different combinations of drives, speeds, and blades.

title: SEMI CHAMPION PLUS
content: SEMI CHAMPION PLUS rotary tillers are very versatile for all types of soil. Thanks to latest technologies and a great variety of speeds, blades, and drive-shaft combinations, these tillers boost with unmatched efficiency when it comes to pulverization.

title: CHAMPION
content: The CHAMPION rotary tiller, as its name suggests, is an out-and-out heavy-duty performer on all types of soils. It has been specifically built for deep tillage, such as in sugarcane and banana fields. Superior performance through different combinations of drives, speeds and blade types along with trouble-free maintenance make this rotary tiller a true CHAMPION.

title: CHAMPION AMERICA
content: The CHAMPION AMERICA rotary tiller, as its name suggests, is an out-and-out heavy-duty performer on all types of soils. It has been specifically built for deep tillage, such as in sugarcane and banana fields. Superior performance through different combinations of drives, speeds and blade types along with trouble-free maintenance make this tiller a true CHAMPION.

title: SIDE SHIFT
content: The SIDE SHIFT rotary tiller features a hydraulic-cylinder shift mechanism that enables operations in central as well as offset positions. As a result, the tiller can easily reach and operate in orchards or vineyards as well as under and between bushes and trees. The SIDE SHIFT rotary tiller has a robust frame and robust structure making it suitable also for tough operating conditions. It is also suitable for track-type tractors.

title: VIKTOR
content: VIKTOR is a multi-purpose rotary tiller that is able to deal with a variety of different tillage applications. It can be used for dryland cultivations ranging from medium to heavy soils. Being available with hydraulically or mechanically adjustable rollers, different speeds, blades, and drive shafts, VIKTOR is your winning element in every situation.

title: VIKTOR PLUS
content: VIKTOR PLUS is a multi-purpose rotary tillers that is able to deal with a variety of different tillage applications. It can be used for dryland cultivations ranging from medium to heavy soils. Being available with hydraulically or mechanically adjustable rollers, different speeds, blades, and drive shafts, VIKTOR PLUS is your winningelement in every situation.

title: TUSKER
content: The TUSKER rotary tiller is specifically designed for banana fields. It features a larger blade for hull clearance providing the extra space required for crushing the banana stems during tillage. This rotary tiller is also suitable for slashing dense, fibrous residue and roots of crops, such as banana, papaya, and sugarcane, which it mixes with the soil in one go. TUSKER comes with multiple speed options and can be fine-tuned through some technical tweaks.

title: LA TUSKER
content: The L-AMERICA rotary tiller is specifically designed for banana fields. It features a larger blade for hull clearance providing the extra space required for crushing the banana stems during tillage. This rotary tiller is also suitable for slashing dense, fibrous residue and roots of crops, such as banana, papaya, and sugarcane, which it mixes with the soil in one go. TUSKER comes with multiple speed options and is fine-tuned through some technical tweaks.

title: INTER CULTIVATOR
content: The INTER CULTIVATOR is a rotary tiller specifically designed for sugarcane fields. As the name suggests, the INTER CULTICATOR tills alternate lanes of sugarcane crop easily.

title: CULTISOL
content: The CULTISOL rotary tiller is a robust and durable implement for hard soil. It features a spring-protection mechanism for stony land. An optional hydraulic depth control is available. CULTISOL has a European design and provides high-class performance along with great efficiency while running operations smoothly.

title: JUMBO
content: JUMBO is one of the heaviest of all rotary tillers from Shaktiman. It features an extraordinarily robust structure providing cutting-edge performance and efficiency even on hard soil. Thanks to hydraulically and mechanically adjustable rollers, multi-speed options and different blade types this rotary tiller ensures easy chopping even of thick and strongly rooted crop residue. JUMBO is designed for heavy-duty applications and covers large areas in less time even in case of challenging soil conditions and large-scale farming operations.

title: JAR 4.5 M
content: JAR 4.5 M is one of the heaviest of all rotary tillers from Shaktiman. It features an extraordinarily robust structure providing cutting-edge performance and efficiency even on hard soil. Thanks to hydraulically and mechanically adjustable rollers, multi-speed options and different blade types this rotary tiller ensures easy chopping even of thick and strongly rooted crop residue. JAR 4.5 M is designed for heavy-duty applications and covers large areas in less time even in case of challenging soil conditions and large-scale farming operations.

title: DHAAN MITRAM
content: DHAAN MITRAM is a light, but strong rotary tiller specifically designed for highest efficiency in puddling operations. This rotary tiller has a larger area coverage with a less-horse-power tractor. The large spring rake equipment makes a smooth and fine soil surface. The leveling plate achieves a uniform flat bed with the required surface compaction. DHAAN MITRAM stands for fuel, cost, and time savings.

title: SRPL LIGHT
content: SRPL LIGHT is a power harrow series specifically designed for 50-HP to 80-HP tractors provided with a CAT-II hitch. SRPL LIGHT is particularly suitable for stony soils. It is available on request with packer, cage, and spike rollers.

title: SRP
content: SRP is a power harrow series specifically designed for tractors ranging from 35 HP to 115 HP provided with a CAT-II hitch. SRP power harrows have a working width up to 3.5 meters and are particularly suitable for stony and demanding soils. They are available on request with packer, cage, and spike rollers.

title: E 90
content: The E 90 power harrow has been specifically designed for 65-HP to 95-HP tractors provided with a CAT-II hitch. E 90 has a working width up to 2.46 meters and is particularly suitable for stony and demanding soils. It is available on request with packer, cage, and spike rollers.

title: M 120
content: The M 120 is a power harrow series specifically designed for tractors ranging from 80 HP to 120 HP provided with a CAT-II or III hitch. The power harrows have a working width of 2.5 and 3 meters and are particularly suitable for professional usage. The M 120 series can be combined with seed drills and are equipped with a PTO shaft and a slip clutch. They are available on request with packer, cage, and spike rollers.

title: H 160
content: The H 160 is a power harrow series specifically designed for tractors ranging from 120 HP to 170 HP provided with a CAT-II or III hitch. H 160 power harrows have a working width from 3 to 4 meters. They are particularly designed for heavy-duty soil bed preparation and can be combined with seed drills. The H 160 power harrows are equipped with a PTO shaft and a slip clutch. On request they are available with packer, cage, and spike rollers.

title: BMA
content: The BMA flail mower is basically a grass shredder designed for hobby farming. It adapts well to low-power tractors and is also robust for mowing tall grass. BMA standard equipment includes an internal freewheel clutch, Y-shaped grass scoops as well as an adjustable roller.

title: BMO
content: The BMO flail mower is basically a grass shredder designed for hobby farming. It adapts well to low-power tractors and is also robust for mowing tall grass. BMO standard equipment includes an internal freewheel clutch, Y-shaped grass scoops as well as an adjustable roller. BMO flail mowers can be used both behind and laterally to the tractor in five different positions.

title: SGM
content: The SGM grooming mower is specifically designed for professional mowing of lawns and grassland. 4 swivel wheels enable the mower to follow the contour of the ground providing a precise and levelled cut even on rough terrains. The SGM grooming mower is best suitable for private and public lawns or parks, airports, hospitals, highways, golf courses, etc.

title: SDFM
content: The SDFM is a side discharge flail mower specifically designed for cutting grass and shredding fibrous and wood stalks up to a diameter of 8 cm. The shredded residues are then discharged back to the soil from both sides of the mower. SDFM is a perfect implement for vineyards. By replacing the discharge unit with a shutter, it can also be used as an ordinary flail mower.

title: SPFM
content: The SPFM is a professional pick-up flail mower featuring twin rotors. The front rotor makes sure that every stalk of straw is picked and shredded finely in the chamber. SPFM is best suited for shredding olive and orchard branches, as well as for vineyard and forestry applications. The SPFM pick-up flail mower comes with fixed or optional pivot wheels for best operations.

title: SFM
content: The SFM is a light-duty flail mower suitable for tractors ranging from 30 to 60 HP. The SFM flail mower comes with multiple options. It is available with hammers as well as knives. The variety of roller options, rakes and standard cover along with hydraulic and mechanical shift mechanism make the SFM flail mower a complete solution for the mowing needs on smaller farms.

title: BMF
content: The BMF is a medium-duty flail mower designed for vineyards and orchards. BMF is available in different sizes up to 2.4 m and can shred shoots of up to 6 cm diameter. BMF distinguishes for its strong frame and heavy hammers in addition to a robust gearbox design with a free-wheel mechanism. All these features make it the perfect flail mower for all fruit and wine growers.

title: BPF
content: BPF is a heavy-duty flail mower suitable for all mowing needs. It easily shreds grass and plant residue up to a thickness of 8 cm. The BPF flail mower has a very robust construction and requires little maintenance.

title: BPF HYD BACK DOOR
content: BPF HYD BACK DOOR is a heavy-duty flail mower suitable for all mowing needs. It easily shreds grass and plant residue up to a thickness of 8 cm. The BMF HYD BACK DOOR flail mower has a very robust construction and requires little maintenance.

title: BPF CLOSED DECK
content: BPF CLOSED DECK is a heavy-duty flail mower suitable for all mowing needs. It easily shreds grass and plant residue to a thickness of 8 cm. The BPF CLOSED DECK flail mower has a very robust construction and requires little maintenance.

title: SRM
content: The SRM rotary mulcher is basically a specifically designed flail mower for the mulching needs of sugarcane farmers. Its raised deck makes shredding and mulching of almost all crops easy. The SRM rotary mulcher is available in both fixed and hydraulic variants.

title: AFM
content: AFM is a flail mower that features a hydraulic arm to facilitate mowing of slopy grounds, roadsides, farms and trenches. Its 150-degree maneuverability makes it perfect for multiple areas and corners. Whether it is for municipalities, farmers, or forestry departments, the AFM armed flail mower is the right solution for tricky tasks.

title: BVF
content: As the heaviest Shaktiman flail mower, BVF facilitates all professional farming operations. It comes with a robust, yet sleek design, and a balanced rotor with hammers. The BVF flail mower can easily chop and shred anything that comes in its way.

title: SRS
content: SRS has been specifically designed for slashing pasture toppings, rough-tough shrubs, and cutting tall weed or grass up to 25 mm. The SRS rotary slasher is a robust, yet handy implement for the maintenance of grassland, road verges and lawns proving the finest shredding.

title: SGMF
content: SGMF has been specifically designed for slashing pasture toppings, rough-tough shrubs, and cutting tall weed or grass up to 25 mm. The SGMF rotary slasher is a robust, yet handy implement for the maintenance of grassland, road verges and lawns proving the finest shredding.

title: SGPF
content: SGPF has been specifically designed for slashing pasture toppings, rough-tough shrubs, and cutting tall weed or grass up to 25 mm. The SGPF rotary slasher is a robust, yet handy implement for the maintenance of grassland, road verges and lawns proving the finest shredding.

title: SGA
content: SGA has been specifically designed for slashing pasture toppings, rough-tough shrubs, and cutting tall weed or grass up to 20 mm. The SGA rotary slasher is a robust, yet handy implement for the maintenance of grassland, road verges and lawns proving the finest shredding.

title: SLC
content: SLC has been specifically designed for slashing pasture toppings, rough-tough shrubs, and cutting tall weed or grass up to 20 mm. The SLC is a robust, yet handy rotary slasher for the maintenance of grassland, road verges and lawns proving the finest shredding.

title: SRSH
content: SRSH is a high-clearance rotary slasher. It has been specifically designed for rice stubbles and grass cutting. Featuring a higher ground clearance than the previous version, SRSH easily cuts grass or stubbles to 2-3 cm height.

title: SHR
content: SHR is a ground-driven tractor-mounted hay rake designed to move mowed windrows across the soil surface or remaining crop stubble, creating a narrower windrow that dries rapidly. SHR has a simple shock-absorbing system that keeps the rake properly grounded. The SHR hay rake has no gears, chains, or other drive components making it a truly low-maintenance tool. It is suitable for paddy, wheat straw, and sugarcane trash.

title: SRHR
content: SRHR is a PTO hay rake meeting all requirements of careful and rapid swathing. It passes through the forage delicately without twisting or entangling, making hence subsequent baling easier. This rotary hay rake works seamlessly on both flat and hilly terrains. SRHR has a light but robust construction ensuring optimized harvesting by raking greater hay quantities at once.

title: SRB 45
content: SRB 45 is a small and compact round baler that picks any combined harvested windrow in one go. The SRB 45 produces round bales of 15-25 kg that are easy to handle manually, making it suitable for smaller fields. This mini round baler features a digital bale counter as electronic buzzers for completion. Due to less spillage and better compaction along with low maintenance and ownership costs, SRB 45 is very feasible and profitable for farmers. It best suits rice, wheat, and sugarcane residues baling.

title: SRB 60 PLUS
content: SRB 60 PLUS is a small and compact round baler that picks any combined harvested windrow in one go. The SRB 60 PLUS produces round bales of 15-25 kg that are easy to handle manually, making it suitable for smaller fields. This mini round baler features a digital bale counter as electronic buzzers for completion. Due to less spillage and better compaction along with low maintenance and ownership costs, SRB 60 PLUS is very feasible and profitable for farmers. It best suits rice, wheat, and sugarcane residues baling.

title: SRB 120
content: SRB 120 is a big round baler with a 6-feet wide pick-up that collects any combined harvested windrow in one go. The SRB 120 produces big round bales and can be towed by higher-power tractors. This big round baler features a digital bale counter as electronic buzzers for completion. Due to less spillage and better compaction along with low maintenance and ownership costs, SRB 120 is very feasible and profitable for farmers. It best suits rice, wheat, and sugarcane residues baling.

title: SBM 165/150
content: BALE MASTER is a compact square baler that ensures hassle-free storage and easy transportation. BALE MASTER uses a PP twine or steel-wire knot for producing heavy and dense bales. This highly efficient and convenient baler comes with a digital counter for the prepared bales. BALE MASTER is particularly suitable for baling rice, wheat, or sugarcane residues.

title: SBM 165 Plus
content: BALE MASTER 165 PLUS is a compact square baler that ensures hassle-free storage and easy transportation. BALE MASTER 165 PLUS uses a PP twine or steel-wire knot for producing heavy and dense bales. This highly efficient and convenient baler comes with a digital counter for the prepared bales. BALE MASTER 165 PLUS is particularly suitable for baling rice, wheat, or sugarcane residues.

title: SBM 175
content: BALE MASTER 175 is a compact square baler that ensures hassle-free storage and easy transportation. BALE MASTER 175 uses a PP twine or steel-wire knot for producing heavy and dense bales. This highly efficient and convenient baler comes with a digital counter for the prepared bales. BALE MASTER 175 is particularly suitable for baling rice, wheat, or sugarcane residues.

title: SFB
content: SFB is a conical fertilizer broadcaster suitable for spreading granular or crystalline fertilizer. The unique spreading disc system ensures the uniform broadcasting of fertilizer even over a greater distance. Precise, systematic, and uniform spreading of fertilizer increases soil fertility.

title: SSFB
content: SSFB is a square fertilizer broadcaster suitable for spreading granular or crystalline fertilizer. The unique spreading disc system ensures the uniform broadcasting of fertilizer even over a greater distance. Precise, systematic, and uniform spreading of fertilizer increases soil fertility.

title: SMS
content: SMS is a mobile shredder that can be used as a forage harvester. After cutting and shredding, the crop residues can be collected in the hitched trolley with an optional hydraulic chute that facilitates the flow direction. SMS is suitable for crops like maize, alfalfa, and napier grass. This mobile shredder comes with a foldable frame for easy transportation in addition to an inbuilt sharpening device.

title: FORAGE HARVESTER
content: The Shaktiman Forage Harvester is a  fodder harvester is a specialized agricultural machine designed for efficient and effective harvesting of fodder crops such as maize, sorghum, and other silage crops. This machine is built to maximize productivity while ensuring high-quality fodder for livestock. The SFH Fodder Harvester allows for adjustable cutting height, giving operators the flexibility to harvest at different levels depending on the type of crop and desired forage quality.

title: BANANA MULCHER
content: SRM is a heavy-duty rotary mulcher suitable for all moving needs. It easily shreds grass and plant residues up to a thickness of 8 cm. This mulcher is particularly robust and needs little maintenance.

title: SDM
content: The Shaktiman Drum Mower is a versatile and efficient agricultural implement designed for cutting and mowing grass, hay, and other types of vegetation. It is particularly useful in managing large areas of grassland, meadows, and pastures. The drum mower is known for its robust construction and effective performance, making it a valuable tool for farmers and land managers.

title: SHCS
content: SHCS is a unique, cost-efficient, and durable farming tool designed for increasing soil fertility by spreading compost uniformly over large fields. It ensures reduced labor costs as it does not need manual interventions. Operations can be either hydraulic or mechanical providing the same level of efficiency. SHCS is also suitable for spreading gravel, sand, gypsum, saw dust, vermi compost and other granular material.

title: SNOW BLOWER
content: This front-mounted snow blower is very useful to remove snow in all conditions – powdery, crusted, icy, or wet – in one go. The snow blower is available in different sizes ranging from 54 to 78 inches and can be used for both residential or commercial purpose.

title: MB PLOUGH LIGHT
content: The hydraulically operated reversible MB PLOUGH LIGHT is a primary tillage equipment. It comes with a precisely hardened and tempered mold board, which facilitates best-in-class soil inversion and breaking up. This buries crop residues and organic matter deep into soil for speedy decomposition, improving soil aeration, and creating a good seedbed. The high under-frame clearance does not tamper the ridge and furrows.

title: MB PLOUGH
content: The hydraulically operated reversible MB PLOUGH is a primary tillage equipment. It comes with a precisely hardened and tempered mold board, which facilitates best-in-class soil inversion and breaking up. This buries crop residues and organic matter deep into soil for speedy decomposition, improving soil aeration, and creating a good seedbed. The high under-frame clearance does not tamper the ridge and furrows.

title: Deep Chisel
content: The Deep Chisel is a powerful agricultural implement designed for deep soil tillage. It is specifically engineered to break up compacted soil layers, enhance soil aeration, and improve water infiltration. This tool is essential for optimizing soil health and promoting better crop growth, especially in fields with hardpans or compacted layers.

title: SSSO
content: The SSSO subsoiler is a powerful agricultural implement designed to break up and loosen soil deeper than standard tillage equipment, promoting better water infiltration, root growth, and overall soil health. This subsoiler is available with 1, 2, or 3 tines for different farming needs and soil conditions.

title: SPHD
content: SPHD is a tractor-operated hole digger that is ideal for digging pits in any type of soil with less time and effort. It can dig pits of up to 36 inches depth in less than 2 minutes, providing a well-defined circumference and a neat finishing. The removed soil remains around the pit making it easier to fill back after plantation or erection. SPHD is particularly suitable for planting saplings of mango, coconut, lemon, teak, pomegranate, or the erection of fencing poles.

title: SMSD
content: SMSD is a compact seeder that can be used even with low HP tractors. It is perfect for spreading fertilizer and planting seeds of wheat, rice, lucerne, rye, oats, peas, barley, soya, red clover, darnel, colza, mustard, maize, and many other crops. It is available in working widths from 2.5 to 3 meters. It comes with a wide range of standard equipment making it a very versatile implement.

title: SVPP
content: SVPP is a tractor-operated precision planter, which employs a pneumatic metering mechanism for placing seeds or fertilizer at a certain depth. As opposed to manual or less advanced sowing methods, it ensures uniform spacing. This enables a good crop stand that contributes to a maximum and uniform germination of seeds and the growth of vigorous seedlings in the fields.

title: SVPP – 6 ROW
content: SVPP-6 ROW is a tractor-operated precision planter, which employs a pneumatic metering mechanism for placing seeds or fertilizer at a certain depth. As opposed to manual or less advanced sowing methods, it ensures uniform spacing. This enables a good crop stand that contributes to a maximum and uniform germination of seeds and the growth of vigorous seedlings in the fields.

title: SCMF – CUTTER MIXER FEEDER
content: The SCMF – CUTTER MIXER FEEDER is a smart piece of equipment specifically designed for the dairy industry. It cuts, mixes, weighs and feeds in one go and is perfect for the professional mixing and distribution of animal fodder. It is possible to adjust the auger revolutions for mixing the desired quantities, e.g. a high percentage of grass, and a small number of concentrates/licks. A hydraulic lever controls the output to distribute the right fodder quantity.

title: RAKSHAK 200
content: RAKSHAK 200 is a tractor-operated boom sprayer much appreciated by farmers because of its robust construction and trouble-free performance. Special nozzles ensure ample spray penetration into soil or crops. In addition to the main chemical tank and an auto-filling attachment, RAKSHAK 200 features also a circuit-cleaning tank and a hand-wash tank. Ultimate agitation provides extraordinary levels of efficiency.

title: RAKSHAK 400/600
content: RAKSHAK 400/600 is a tractor-operated boom sprayer much appreciated by farmers because of its robust construction and trouble-free performance. Special nozzles ensure ample spray penetration into soil or crops. In addition to the main chemical tank and an auto-filling attachment, RAKSHAK 200 features also a circuit-cleaning tank and a hand-wash tank. Ultimate agitation provides extraordinary levels of efficiency.

title: VINEYARD 200 / ORCHARD 200
content: VINEYARD 200 and ORCHARD 200 are tractor-operated boom sprayers specifically designed for being used in vineyards and orchards, respectively. The highly efficient sprayers have a robust construction and provide trouble-free performance. Special nozzles ensure ample spray penetration into soil or crops.

title: VINEYARD 400 / ORCHARD 400
content: VINEYARD 400 and ORCHARD 400 are tractor-operated boom sprayers specifically designed for being used in vineyards and orchards, respectively. The highly efficient sprayers have a robust construction and provide trouble-free performance. Special nozzles ensure ample spray penetration into soil or crops.

title: Protektor 600/900
content: The PROTEKTOR series consists of self-propelled high-clearance boom sprayers that are specially designed with a wider boom span for extensive crop coverage. During spraying operations, PROTEKTOR ensures reduced damage to tall crops like cotton, sunflower, paddy, and chilly due to higher ground clearance. Its advanced nozzles blast the spray into low-micron droplet size ensuring ample penetration into crops with top-to-bottom leaf coverage and reduced chemical usage. The hydrostatic transmission system of the 4WD vehicle stands for smooth, agile, and flexible operations.

title: PROTEKTOR 600 AC CABIN
content: Protektor is designed for spraying agrochemicals on crop planted in row to row pattern. Suitable for spraying ground crops. High ground clearance, narrow wheels and short turning radius ensure minimum crop damages, hydraulic height adjustment boom with pendulum mechanism ensures stability and uniformity on uneven surfaces.

title: STMP
content: Shaktiman has developed India’s first Self-Propelled Tree Maintenance Platform with varied and multiple applications across different sectors. It provides fast and direct top access to tree or any higher object. With storage buckets and power operated tools it is much more productive than traditional climbing. It is highly reliable and comes in handy in applications ranging from harvesting, tree pruning, tree canopy maintenance, washing, painting, cleaning, industrial/civil/electrical maintenance and street-light servicing.

title: PADDY ROPAK 37
content: PADDY ROPAK 37 is a specialized rice transplanter for the purpose of transplanting rice seedlings onto paddy fields.

title: PADDY MASTER 3776
content: The Paddy Harvester 3776 is a highly efficient machine designed for harvesting paddy. It features a fast and clean unloading auger which ensures quick and hassle-free grain discharge. Equipped with a grain tank sensor, it provides real-time monitoring of grain levels to optimize operations. Additionally, its wider, longer, and thicker rubber track ensures superior stability, durability, and reduced ground pressure, making it suitable for various field conditions.

title: PADDY MASTER 3785
content: PADDY MASTER 3785 is a track-driven combine harvester for paddy fields that combines harvesting, threshing, cleaning and bagging efficiently.

Shaktiman’s Sugarcane Harvester SSCH 3737 is designed for superior performance with its lightweight yet durable construction and efficient operational systems. The harvester features a smooth, uniform feed that reduces cane losses and soil content. Its large, premium cab combines advanced technology with exceptional comfort. Powered by a Cummins BS-III engine, it offers robust performance tailored to meet the specific needs of farming operations.

title: SSCH 3737 TEJAS
content: The new SSCH 3737 Tejas sugarcane harevster combines cutting-edge technology with robust performance, designed to meet the needs of modern farming. Powered by an advanced CRDI engine, it ensures exceptional fuel efficiency and reduced emissions. Featuring an auto-greasing system and an extractor fan with variable speed, the harvester minimizes maintenance while maximizing operational efficiency.

title: 3737-BSIV
content: 3737-BSIV is part of the advanced Shaktiman Sugarcane Harvester series that deals efficiently with all sugarcane crop harvesting operations including cane cutting, removing trash, leaves, and dirt from the cane plus an elevator conveyor system. Advanced technology and many specific features provide best performance and higher yields.

title: 3737 MEGA
content: 3737 MEGA is part of the advanced Shaktiman Sugarcane Harvester series that deals efficiently with all sugarcane crop harvesting operations including cane cutting, removing trash, leaves, and dirt from the cane plus an elevator conveyor system. Advanced technology and many specific features provide best performance and higher yields.

title: SSCH 3737 TEJAS-V-CE
content: The SHAKTIMAN BS-V CANE HARVESTER 3737 TEJAS CE is designed to deliver top-tier performance and efficiency. Powered by the Volvo BS-V engine, it combines power and fuel savings with its Auto Save Mode. Safety and durability are prioritized with a rear-view camera, larger display, and a guard for the tail lamp.

4437 is part of the advanced Shaktiman Sugarcane Harvester series that deals efficiently with all sugarcane crop harvesting operations including cane cutting, removing trash, leaves, and dirt from the cane plus an elevator conveyor system. Advanced technology and many specific features provide best performance and higher yields.

title: COTTON MASTER
content: COTTON MASTER is a highly efficient cotton picker. It comes with multiple advanced features for best performance and increased cotton yields. By means of fast cotton picking at reduced labor and fuel costs and hassle-free operations, the COTTON MASTER is a true master on your cotton fields. In addition, operator comfort is assured by the air-conditioned cabin with ergonomic seats and easy steering.

title: SSBM 850
content: Powered by 7 electric motors, the SSBM 850 silage baler is the result of cutting-edge agricultural technology and precision engineering. Designed to streamline the entire silage-making process, this farming equipment is a must-have for farmers who are looking for efficient silage baling performance to improve the overall silage quality. SSBM 850 stands for high density and easy-to-handle bales.

title: ATOM
content: ATOM rotary tillers are very versatile implements designed for compact tractors in inter cultivation operations or other orchard applications. ATOM tillers greatly control weed growth and provide enhanced dry-tillage efficiency. Their all-purpose utility makes them a must-have on every farm.

title: SRBV 160
content: A variable chamber round baler is a used for bundling hay or other crops into round bales. The chamber can be adjusted to accommodate different crop sizes and moisture levels, allowing for more flexibility and efficiency in the baling process. It produces big round bales. It’s suitable for bigger fields and can be driven by higher HP tractors. With less spillage and better compaction, it incurs very low maintenance and ownership costs which makes it economically viable and hence very profitable for farmers.

title: MP250
content: MP250 folding power harrow is mainly used to till heavy duty soil and prepare the soil to create an optimal seedbed for planting crops without creating any hard pan through vertical axis rotation. It is specifically designed for the tractor ranges from 160 HP to 250 HP with category 3 hitch.Robust construction with working width up to 5 & 6 m . It has packer roller, cage roller and spike roller & suitable for stony and demanding soils

title: 4437 WITH TRACK
content: The SHAKTIMAN SSCH-4437 is a powerhouse in sugarcane harvesting, driven by a powerful Scania Tier II engine for unmatched performance. Equipped with the graphic display provides real-time engine and harvesting insights, ensuring perfection in every operation.

title: ULL
content: ULL rotary tiller series exclusively designed & built for the European & American markets which can be used for small scale farming with smaller HP tractors , It is suitable for gardening & hobby farming usage .

title: UH REVERSE ROTATION
content: The Shaktiman UH Reverse Rotation Rotary Tiller is a specialized agricultural implement designed for efficient tillage. Unlike conventional rotary tillers, this machine features reverse rotation, meaning the blades rotate in the opposite direction of travel. This results in finer soil tilling, deeper cultivation, and better mixing of crop residues or organic matter into the soil.

title: IN OUT
content: The Shaktiman In-Out Rotary Tiller is a high precision inter row tillage machine, specially designed for vineyards, orchards, and plantations. Built for effective mechanical weed control, it promotes better soil aeration and root health without the use of herbicides making it ideal for organic and sustainable farming. A standout feature is its hydraulic side shift mechanism with sensor based obstacle detection, allowing the tiller to automatically manoeuvre around trees, vines, and posts with ease. The machine also includes hydraulic tilting of the rotor head, which is heightadjustable and equipped with a spring damper to absorb violent shocks, ensuring smooth operation in challenging field conditions. For added protection, the rotor is fitted with a special safety coupling in the transmission, guarding against sudden impacts or overloads. With its uniform tillage, efficient weed suppression, and easy manoeuvrability, the Shaktiman In and Out Rotary Tiller delivers healthier fields with minimal labour and zero chemicals.

title: SFRT-6M
content: The Shaktiman Folding Rotary Tiller is the ultimate solution for efficient and thorough soil preparation. Designed to deliver unmatched performance on even the toughest terrains, this is Shaktiman’ s heaviest and most robust rotary tiller, built to withstand the demands of continuous heavy-duty use. Equipped with high-performance rotary blades, it expertly breaks up, aerates, and mixes the soil—creating the ideal seedbed while effortlessly handling thick, well-rooted crop residues. Its mechanically adjustable rollers and multi-speed gearbox offer enhanced control and adaptability across various field conditions.The innovative folding design allows for a wider working width in the field, while ensuring easy transport and compact storage. This means you can cover more ground in less time—making it a favourite among professional farmers seeking maximum efficiency and durability.Whether you’re preparing hard-packed soil or managing large tracts of farmland, the Shaktiman Folding Rotary Tiller delivers cutting-edge performance, unmatched reliability, and rugged strength—season after season.

title: TIGER
content: Tiger series rotary tiller is a lean and mean specifically carved out for puddling as well as other dry land application. It comes in handy in preparing for seedbeds on clay soil and delta belts. Agile yet sturdy, it is light in weight, easy on the tractor and is thus fuel efficient. It’s sturdy blades helps in getting rid of weeds, improving drainage, and relieving compaction of the soil.

title: IN-OUT ROTARY HARROW
content: In-Out Rotary Harrow is a high-precision inter-row tillage solution designed for vineyards & orchards segments and It engineered for sustainable farming, it enables effective mechanical weed control, improving soil aeration and root development—without the use of herbicides. It equipped with sharp vertically mounted blades for deep, narrow tillage. It’s vertical design allows blades to break up compacted layers, improving water infiltration and root expansion. With hydraulic side-shift and sensor-guided obstacle detection, the harrow smoothly navigates around trees and vines. A safety coupling shields the rotor from shocks and overloads, ensuring reliable tillage, effective weed control, and chemical-free farming with minimal effort. Perfectly suited for organic farming, it eliminates the need for chemical herbicides by offering deep, uniform tillage that suppresses weed growth naturally.

title: AFM LIGHT DUTY
content: Light-duty arm flail mower is a specialized piece of agricultural equipment used for cutting vegetation, such as grass, shrubs, and small trees, in various terrains. It is designed to be attached to a tractor and operates using a rotating shaft with multiple hammer blades assembled. The “arm” feature allows the mower to extend outwards, making it ideal for reaching areas that are difficult to mow with traditional equipment, such as roadside verges, ditches and embankments.

title: AFM HEAVY DUTY
content: The Shaktiman Arm Flail Mower Heavy Duty is a robust agricultural implement designed for mowing, shredding, and vegetation management on various terrains. It features an arm that allows the mower to extend outwards, Its arm is hydraulically connected & it’s making particularly effective for maintaining ditches, hedges, embankments, and roadsides

title: SFM LIGHT
content: The SFM Light Duty Flail Mower offers versatility, durability, and efficiency for light-duty mowing tasks. Its design allows for smooth operation on rough, uneven terrain while delivering a neat and clean cut. This mower is ideal for maintaining residential gardens, small farms, orchards, and parks, where manoeuvrability and consistent performance are essential.

title: SFM ULTRA LIGHT
content: The SFM Light Duty Flail Mower offers versatility, durability, and efficiency for light-duty mowing tasks. Its design allows for smooth operation on rough, uneven terrain while delivering a neat and clean cut. This mower is ideal for maintaining residential gardens, small farms, orchards, and parks, where manoeuvrability and consistent performance are essential.

title: BZF
content: A BZF flail mower is designed for cutting grass, weeds, and other vegetation. It use hammer blades mounted on rotating rotor. It is having a robust transmission with 5 belts & It has a wide range of applications, primarily in agriculture, landscaping, and forestry. It is majorly applicable for the heavy duty application & It built to handle tough terrain and dense vegetation, making it ideal for overgrown areas.

title: SFFM
content: The Shaktiman folding flail mower designed for agricultural and land maintenance tasks. It is ideal for cutting grass, managing overgrown areas, and even handling tougher vegetation on larger tracts of land. It is the best solution for farmers, landowners, and maintenance crews who need reliable equipment for managing large areas of land. It is beneficial for farmers having a huge land holding.

title: SRS 3.2
content: Shaktiman Rotary Slasher may be specialized for handling heavy-duty agricultural tasks as a robust agricultural implement designed for efficient mowing and shredding of large areas, including fallow lands, crop residues, and pastures. It’s coming with Powerful Gearbox System , Efficient cutting mechanism , Durability and Strengthen build quality with Suitable for a wide range of applications.

title: SRB 45C
content: Shaktiman Round Baler-45 Compact is a smaller and lighter round baler. Compact model is  designed for ease of maneuverability in tight spaces and smaller fields. Provided with density control with 3 options through mechanical linkages and an adjustable track width with bolt and nut. It is ideal for handling residues like hay or straw offering both reliability and performance in every bale.

title: Static  Shredder
content: The Shaktiman Mobile Static Shredder is a robust and efficient agricultural machine designed for shredding crop residues, branches, and organic waste into fine pieces. This stationary yet transportable machine helps farmers manage agricultural waste effectively, turning it into nutrient-rich mulch or compost material. Its powerful shredding mechanism and user-friendly design make it an ideal solution for sustainable farming practices.

title: SHSDCS
content: The Shaktiman side discharge hyd. compost spreader is designed exclusively for conventional agricultural applications and is suitable spreading the compost of manure one side of the soil to increase its fertility. By applying the compost to the side, the operator can avoid compacting the soil with the tires of the tractor, reducing soil damage and preserving soil structure.

title: HORIZONTAL FEED MIXER
content: The Shaktiman horizontal feed mixer is a vital piece of equipment in agricultural settings, specifically designed to efficiently mix animal feed ingredients. This machine is vital for dairy and livestock breeders, as it effortlessly provides the required shredding of various materials including Stalks, Alfalfa, Oats, Grass, Bale packages. In a remarkably short time, the Shaktiman horizontal feed mixer can process large quantities of feed, making it an ideal solution for both large-scale industrial livestock breeders and small-scale farmers.

title: VERTICAL FEED MIXER
content: Vertical feed mixer is a specialized agricultural machine designed for efficiently mixing animal feed ingredients Its verticaldesign allows for optimal mixing performance and is suitable for various livestock operations, from small farms to largecommercial feed mills The outlet is controlled by a hydraulic lever to distribute the right quantity of fodder This machine isessential for dairy and livestock breeders, it easily provides the required shredding of stalks, alfalfa, oats, grass, bale packages in a short time making it suitable for both large and small scale livestock breeders

title: SSBM 600
content: Silage Baler stands at the forefront of innovation in agricultural technology, oering a revolutionary solution for farmers seeking ecient and eectivesilage baling. Designed with precision engineering and advanced features, this baler is engineered to streamline the silage-making process, enhanceproductivity, and improve the overall quality of silage produced.

title: PROTEKTOR 900 AC CABIN
content: Protektor 900 AC Cabin self-propelled sprayer is equipped with a reliable Kubota diesel engine, navigation system and a comfortable air-conditioned cabin for all-weather operation. It features a pendulum mechanism with a telescopic boom for stable and adjustable spraying over uneven terrain. A diaphragm spray pump ensures consistent pressure, while the jet agitation system maintains a uniform chemical mix. Hydrostatic transmission with a two-speed gearbox provides smooth control and versatility in the field. Ceramic nozzle tips offer long-lasting precision, and 4WD with 4WS ensures excellent traction and maneuverability. Designed for spraying agrochemicals on crop planted in row to row pattern and suitable for spraying ground crops

title: E60
content: E60 Power Harrow is an advanced agricultural implement designed for soil preparation. It is mainly used to till and prepare the soil to create an optimal seedbed for planting crops without creating any hard pan through vertical axis rotation. It is specifically designed for the tractor ranges from 40 HP to 60 HP with category-II hitch.SPH E60 Power harrow have a robust construction & high-quality gearbox to handle the rigors of challenging terrain and maintain power consistency across various soil types.

title: SDH
content: This implement has been a designed to meet the needs of tillage applications such as preparing soil for crops & improve soil fertility. It’s designed with set of curved, circular rotating discs attached to the solid mainframe. It isused to chop up unwanted weeds or crop residue. Because of it’s reversed angle of attack on the soil, Each disc relies on it’s weight to penetrate the vegetations and soil.It is having highly durable and reliable three-point linkage mounted and it applicable with CAT-II & CAT-III hitching category, Which can be used in all types of soil. It can be used to cut through and break up hard, compacted soil, allowing for the better water penetration, air circulation and roots growth.

title: STRHR
content: A Twin Rotor Hay Rake is a equipment used to collect hay in one line, such as alfalfa, grass, or other types of crops. It is a proper machine meeting all the requirements of rapid and careful swathing. It delivery rakes improve productivity and form uniform swaths sized to meet the requirements of high capacity balers & other application. These rotary rakes provide important features to ensure clean raking without contaminating. They also preserve the stubble and maintain high output, even on rough terrain.

title: ORCHARD 600
content: The orchard sprayer is tractor mounted one, specifically designed for orchard crops. It is a compact and robust construction and specialized ceramic nozzle tips that ensure precise spray penetration and excellent coverage. Suitable for all kind of orchard crops where tractor entry is possible.

title: Vineyard 600
content: Vineyard sprayer is tractor mounted type which is specially designed for vineyards. It is robust construction and compact for ease of use in vineyard fields. Its specialized ceramic nozzle tips that ensure precise spray penetration on vineyards and excellent coverage.

title: SSCH 3737 MAR-1
content: Introducing our high-performance Shaktiman Sugarcane Harvesters, designed for optimal efficiency and productivity. Equipped with a powerful Cummins MAR-1 engine, this harvester feature a robust yet lightweight construction, advanced front-end technology, and a premium cab with cutting-edge technology and unparalleled comfort.

title: SSCH 3737 TEJAS-V-BR
content: Powered by a robust Volvo BS III engine, the SSCH 3737 TEJAS-V-BR is engineered for superior performance and efficiency. Designed to meet the demanding needs of modern sugarcane harvesting, this machine is built to reduce labor costs, optimize fuel consumption, and enhance operator comfort with state-of-the-art features and safety.
